name: docwire
description: Data processing library/SDK. Parses DOC, XLS, XLSB, PPT, RTF, ODF (ODT, ODS, ODP), OOXML (DOCX, XLSX, PPTX), iWork (PAGES, NUMBERS, KEYNOTE), ODFXML (FODP, FODS, FODT), PST, OST and more. Contains embedded OCR engine and CLI utiity.

address-sanitizer.description: Enable address sanitizer in debug build

thread-sanitizer.description: Enable thread sanitizer in debug build

memcheck.description: Enable valgrind memcheck in automatic tests

helgrind.description: Enable valgrind helgrind in automatic tests

callgrind.description: Enable valgrind callgrind in automatic tests
